title: Output Options section
extract: An expression which appears within an output section definition is relative to the base of the output section. An expression which appears elsewhere will be absolute. A symbol set to a relative expression will be relocatable if you request relocatable output using the -r option.
extract_html: An expression which appears within an output section definition is relative to the base of the output section. An expression which appears elsewhere will be absolute. A symbol set to a relative expression will be relocatable if you request relocatable output using the -r option.
